/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/img-redundant-alt */ import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function PostDetail(){ const [post, setPost] = useState(null); const {id} = useParams(); const fetchPost = async() =>{ try { await axios.get('http://localhost:8000/api/posts/:id') } catch (error) { } } useEffect(()=>{ fetchPost(); }) return <>
